alert.note: Alert for Auglaize; Hardin; Logan; Shelby (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 25 at 11:56AM EDT until April 25 at 12:30PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Shelby County in west central Ohio... Northwestern Logan County in west central Ohio... East central Auglaize County in west central Ohio... Southwestern Hardin County in west central Ohio... * Until 1230 PM EDT. * At 1156 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Sidney, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Sidney, Bellefontaine, Anna, Jackson Center, Russells Point, De Graff, Lakeview, Belle Center, Chippewa Park, Northwood, Roundhead, Quincy, Rushsylvania, Huntsville, Port Jefferson, Montra, Mcmorran, Maplewood, Bloom Center and Pemberton. This includes I-75 in Ohio between mile markers 92 and 101. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
